data.actual_result: Shows the full-screen icon with arrows pointing out. (Note: This is a discord glitch and not an apple glitch as other applications can do this fine.)

data.steps_to_repro: - Click fullscreen - The icon for going out of full screen will still show the fullscreen icon.
